entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a main character in the story who releases Neville and pulls out his wand.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is released by Harry, but no further information about him is provided.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore turns to the dais as Sirius falls through the veil.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather who falls through the ancient doorway and disappears behind the veil.

entities.name: bellatrix lestrange
entities.description: Bellatrix Lestrange screams triumphantly, but her scream means nothing to Harry as Sirius has not reappeared.

relationships.description: Harry releases Neville, though he is unaware of doing so.
Dumbledore turns to the dais as Sirius falls through the veil.
Harry is unconcerned by Bellatrix's triumphant scream, knowing that Sirius has not reappeared.
Sirius is Harry's godfather who falls through the ancient doorway and disappears behind the veil.
